Name: Lost Gems
About the game: Lost Gems is a reincarnation classic computer puzzle game like a sokoban. Your goal is to push and merge gems. The level will be completed when all gems are removed from the level. It is not always as easy as it looks like, taking into account that you cannot pull gems nor walk over them. Play 60+ levels. Challenge your brain! Good luck! Features 60 levels avaliable now, which equals to few hours of fun (+20 levels in development) different difficulties from lite to very hard intuitive controls hint system help yours solve hard level all levels are proved to be solvable simple and clean interface free of unnecessary distractions more 8 new mechanics, include: Bombs Magnet 'Ghost' 'Pusher Mekhanism' Turret Fall Platform 'Eye Bot' and more
